issues.message: Use 'Akka.Actor.IInternalActorRef' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.LocalActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.IActorRefFactory' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.ActorSystem'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
